comment._content: NYT of February 3, 1916 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F40F13F6355C1373... reports on Zeppelin raids in eastern England the previous Monday. The article mentions a bomb dropping near a "mission room" in Staffordshire.

comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: Apparently the mission was a Congregational chapel and four people were killed.  At least one inquest on the casualties brought in a verdict of "Wilful murder by the Kaiser."
